solution_line_template: There are {jean_count} + {friends_count} = <<{jean_count}+{friends_count}={total_players}>>{total_players} of them playing games of dominoes.
Thus, each of them will receive {total_dominoes}/{total_players} = <<{total_dominoes}/{total_players}={dominoes_per_player}>>{dominoes_per_player} dominoes.
